  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CollectionManager
    The biggest receiver Contains methods for working with the Movies collection
    FileManager
    It works with files, both with Movie storage and with scripts.
    Manager
    first of all I want to say that I decided to separate the "Receivers" into FileManager, ProgramManager, ReceiverStorage, CollectionManager.
    OscarCountComparator
    As you can guess, This is a class who compare movies by the number of Oscars
    ProgramManager
    Contains main methods such as ProgramManager.exit() and ProgramManager.start(CollectionManager, FileManager).
    ReceiverStorage
    The main receiver This is an unusual manager - it stores collections of all receivers, contains a collection of Movies, also a collection of all program commands
